name: The Messenger (2020)
description:
Hi! We are group of game design students in U-TAD, Spain. We love making games and we want to share it with you. Feel free to give your opininion so we can improve the games and make them even more fun.
Note: This is a prototype made in a month, not a final version of the game. We have in mind to implement many more elements and dynamize the game scenarios.
